content: in this legal case the tallinn district court made a decision regarding a claim for compensation and the division of joint assets between two parties referred to as x and y the court ruled that x is entitled to compensation of 1773451 euros and ordered the division of joint assets including a car shares and funds in bank accounts the court also determined that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the exact amount was not specified x appealed the decision and the court granted the appeal in part the court explained the burden of proof in a civil case stating that the party relying on an obligation to compensate must prove the circumstances underlying their claim the court found that the defendants statements were contradictory and lacked evidence the court also found that the defendant wrongly reduced the joint assets by making transfers and withdrawing money and ordered them to compensate x the court concluded that the procedural costs should be shared by both parties the decision of the court is subject to further appeal to the supreme court

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
